description: Barnsley register their eighth away win of the League One season as they beat 10-man Peterborough United.
title: Peterborough United 1-3 Barnsley
title_page: Peterborough United 1-3 Barnsley: Tykes continue good away form - BBC Sport
maintext:
Peterborough United are unbeaten across their last three league games against Barnsley (W2 D1), scoring 2+ goals in each of those matches.
Barnsley are unbeaten across their last four away league games against Peterborough United (W2 D2), netting eight goals in total during that time.
Peterborough are unbeaten across their last seven final Football League games of the year when theyâ€™ve fallen at home (W1 D6), since a 2-1 defeat to Brighton at London Road in 1998.
Barnsley have lost just one of their last nine final league games of the year (W4 D4), scoring exactly two goals in three of their last four such matches.
